<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Sing to the Steel](/Feats.aspx?ID=3042) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Nantambu Chime-Ringer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=106)

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Nantambu Chime-Ringer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3039)

</column>

---

You strike magical tones that can turn the tide of combat. You and your allies within 30 feet gain the effects of one of the following runes until the end of your next turn: [_corrosive_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=292), [_disrupting_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=294), [_flaming_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295), [_frost_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296), [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297), [_shock_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=303), or [_thundering_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=306). The effects apply to a single weapon the creature is holding or one of the creature's [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attacks. You choose the rune and the effect applies to all creatures. You can use an action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait, to extend the duration of the rune for 1 additional round up to a maximum of 1 minute. If this would give a weapon or unarmed attack more property runes than its normal maximum, an existing property rune (as the creature chooses) is suppressed until the spell ends.
name: Sing to the Steel
